name: Wanderer (Jar29)
description:
Wanderer - A walking sim attempting to visualise my perspective of creative block during difficult times.

Controls

WASD for movement

Look around using the mouse 

Return to the main menu using the Escape key

Assets 

Trees from https://brokenvector.itch.io/low-poly-tree-pack

Textures from https://polyhaven.com/textures

Field Of Fireflies by Purrple Cat | https://purrplecat.com/
